rooms.description: Expansive entry space leading to an open-plan living area with minimalistic Brutalist concrete finishes. Emphasis on raw textures aligning with the split-level design.
Spacious dining space integrated into the living area, featuring a bar counter and natural light from strategically placed windows. West-facing aspects considered for optimal evening ambience.
Modern kitchen with high functionality, raw concrete elements typical of Brutalism, and integrated cabinetry. Ventilation is enhanced by Vastu-compliant positioning.
Luxurious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom, featuring a secluded nook for a private reading area. The room's placement respects Vastu principles of north and east.
Secondary bedroom with ample natural light and a personal study space integrated into the design. The room is oriented for optimal energy flow per Vastu guidelines.
Additional bedroom with basic amenities and a focus on structural simplicity to maintain the Brutalist aesthetic.
Primary bathroom serving multiple bedrooms, designed for minimalistic yet functional use, following Vastu principles by avoiding east-west extremes.

A dedicated library space with built-in shelves, a central reading table, and expansive windows on the west side to capture the evening light. Incorporates natural stone finishes for a luxurious feel.
Accommodating guest with essential amenities and privacy, positioned in harmony with Vastu principles by maintaining balance with surrounding spaces.
A small outdoor space adjoining the living area for relaxation, designed to offer a west-facing view in line with luxury and aesthetic considerations.

openings.description: Large double doors that set the tone for the farmhouse's Brutalist design. Positioned to welcome natural light while ensuring security.
Uniform series of large windows installed along the west-facing wall of the living and dining areas to maximize evening light and align with luxury aesthetics.
Sturdy door leading from the living area to the balcony, designed for easy access to outdoor space while maintaining structural integrity.
